name: Invert And Mirror Normalized Values
description: This node performs some typical functions on a list of normalized values: Invert, Mirror Horizontally & Mirror Vertically. The node inputs expect a list, some booleans (i.e. perform a function or not?) and the number of items in a row of the specified list. A typical use case would be the manipulation of image data after having been processed by a Color Brightness/Hue/Saturation node.
contents: Invert And Mirror Normalized Values - Inverts and mirrors (horizontally & vertically) a list of normalized values.
